name: Rotator
overview: Psytronik Software is proud to present ROTATOR, a previously unreleased arcade game for the Commodore Amiga. Take control of your ROTATOR craft and carefully manoeuvre it through the varied challenging landscapes collecting diamonds whilst trying to stay above the ever-rising flood level! This game contains an amazing replay feature where is basically records everything you do in real-time. If you fail at a level you can replay the recording of your progress and then resume control of the game at any time. Rotator was was initially developed in the mid 90s by Tim Gilbert and Shaun Watters as a Licenceware game. The success of Black Dawn Rebirth prompted an updated version of Rotator with new music, graphics and levels. Initially intended to be released as "Rotator 2", the number was dropped due to the obscurity of the original.
